title: ITabAndSlotGroupData.D1OffsetFromStart
description: Gets or sets the starting offset of the tabs/slots in this group.
returns: Distance from the edge where to start the tabs and slots
remarks:
This method is valid only if
ITabAndSlotGroupData::Offset
is set to true.
If you want the tabs/slots to span the entire edge of the model, set both this property and
ITabAndSlotGroupData::D2OffsetFromEnd
to zero.
